deployments.title: Add retry logic to email notifications

deployments.author: john.dev@example.com
deployments.title: Increase HTTP client timeout to 30s
deployments.description: Update HTTP client timeout from 10s to 30s to handle slow downstream services. This prevents premature timeout errors when calling external APIs.

deployments.author: bob.sre@example.com
deployments.title: Revert: Increase HTTP client timeout to 30s
deployments.description: Emergency rollback of PR #12345 due to database connection pool exhaustion
